div.p: I think with schooling was the death of my father really and not having sort of that role model if you like to point me in the right direction
and stuff; my dad was an ex Royal Marine and I would have loved him to see me join the Army, he’d turn in his grave if he knew
I joined the Army and not the Marines but you know I’d have loved him to have seen that and he didn’t; that had a massive effect
and I think from there on in I’ve made my own way really with what I’ve done and tried to be resilient in what I’ve done and stuff
and want to do the best that I can...
